game.name: DCS: AV-8B Sky Warrior Campaign
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: In this campaign, you will be assigned the role of a pilot of the US marine corps, in which flying the famous AV-8B Harrier II fighter-attack aircraft, you will participate in the liberation of the territory of Georgia from invaders.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this campaign, you will be assigned the role of a pilot of the US marine corps, in which flying the famous AV-8B Harrier II fighter-attack aircraft, you will participate in the liberation of the territory of Georgia from invaders.
